subject: Re: Admin Access to Eptec website
preview: Hi Allie  We will require Word Press training for our new Admin users. Can you please provide 3 x options (day & time) when you conduct a session via Zoom/Teams etc.  Thank you  Sancha  Sancha Kla

We will require Word Press training for our new Admin users. Can you please provide 3 x options (day & time) when you conduct a session via Zoom/Teams etc.

Thank you
